talents_list.description: any target adjacent takes dam = Str bonus with melee weapon

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: You twirl your weapon around you in a blur, creating a circle of death around you. Any enemy target that begins its turn adjacent to you takes damage equal to your Strength bonus. You must be wielding a melee weapon to use this talent.

talents_list.name: White Current Adept
talents_list.description: Use the Force replaces Stealth, considered trained, if can reroll Stealth can reroll Use the Force
talents_list.full_text_description: You can make a Use the Force check in place of a Stealth check. You are considered trained in the Stealth skill. If you are entitled to a Stealth check reroll, you can reroll your Use the Force check instead (subject to the same circumstances and limitations).

talents_list.name: Wicked Strike
talents_list.description: Crit with a lightsaber, move target -2 CT
talents_list.full_text_description: When you score a critical hit with a lightsaber, you may spend a Force Point to move the target -2 steps along the condition track (see Conditions, page 148).

talents_list.name: Wild Sense
talents_list.description: 1/turn touch mind of indifferent or better beast w/in 12 sq & LOS, beast's Perception & LOS is yours

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: As a swift action once per turn, you can make a Use the Force check to touch the mind of a beast with an indifferent or better attitude toward you, provided it is within 12 squares of you and in your line of sight. When you do so, the beast makes an immediate active Perception check, and you are considered to perceive everything that the beast does, including noticing targets, as though you had made the check. Additionally, until the end of your turn, you are considered to have line of sight to anything the beast has line of sight to.

talents_list.name: Willful Resolve
talents_list.description: once per encounter negate the effect of a single attack or skill check v. Will Def

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: Once per encounter, you can negate the effect of a single attack roll or skill check made against you that targets your Will Defense.

talents_list.name: Willpower
talents_list.description: once per encounter grant allies in LOS +2 Will Def for encounter even if out of LOS, not self

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: You can share your strength of will with your allies. Once per encounter as a swift action, you can grant all allies within line of sight a +2 morale bonus to their Will Defense. This bonus lasts for the remainder of the encounter, and once it is granted your allies need not remain within line of sight with you to retain this bonus. You may not use this talent on yourself. This is a mind-affecting effect.

talents_list.name: Wind Vortex
talents_list.description: gain concealment & +2 Ref Def v. thrown weapons until end of encounter

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: You can spend a Force Point as a swift action to surround yourself with whirling winds. You gain concealment from all other targets and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex Defense against thrown weapons. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter.

talents_list.name: Wingman
talents_list.description: Pilot DC15, to assist allied starfighter w/in 2 squares, ally +5 Pilot in dogfight

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: As a swift action, you can make a DC 15 Pilot check to assist any allied starfighter or airspeeder within 2 squares at starship scale. If you succeed, the pilot of that vehicle gains a +5 bonus on all opposed Pilot checks relating to the dogfight action until the start of your next turn.

talents_list.name: Wingman Retribution
talents_list.description: 1/round make a vehicle weapon atk at -5 v. ally's attacker if damage dealt (Colossal or smaller)

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: When a vehicle of Colossal size or smaller that is piloted by an ally is damaged by an attack, once per round as a reaction you can make a vehicle weapon attack with a -5 penalty against your ally’s attacker.

talents_list.name: Wrath of the Dark Side
talents_list.description: when you roll nat 20 with force power that deals dam, not regain powers for dam & half dam next turn

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: When you roll a natural 20 on a Use the Force check to activate a Force power that directly deals damage to a target, you can choose not to regain all of your spent Force powers as normal and instead the targets damaged by the power take half that damage again at the start of their next turn. Only powers that directly damage the target are subject to this talent, including corruption, Force blast, Force grip, Force lightning, Force slam, Force storm, Force thrust (only when spending a Force Point), and repulse (only when spending a Force Point).

talents_list.name: Wrong Decision
talents_list.description: each time you're attacked opponent -2 Will Def until end of next turn

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: Each time you are attacked, the opponent that attacked you takes a -2 morale penalty to its Will Defense until the end of your next turn. This penalty is not cumulative, so if a target makes multiple attacks against you it only incurs the penalty once per turn.

talents_list.name: Wrruushi Expertise
talents_list.description: 1/turn when dam target with unarmed atk make atk v. Fort Def for target to take only 1 swif next turn, if you're in light or no armor

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: Once per turn, when you damage a creature or droid with an unarmed attack, you can make an attack against the target’s Fortitude Defense as a free action. If that attack is successful, the target can take only a single swift action on their next turn. You can use this talent only while wearing light armor or no armor.

talents_list.name: Zone of Recuperation
talents_list.description: any ally who uses second wind in your Safe Zone gains additional hp = your cl

effects.summary: Mechanics are described textually in the description.

talents_list.full_text_description: Any ally who catches a second wind while within your safe zone regains a number of additional hit points equal to your class level.
